00031 PlainTriples::PlainTriples()
00032 {
00033 }
00034 
00035 PlainTriples::PlainTriples(Dictionary *dictionary, unsigned int ntriples, unsigned int parsing)
00036 {
00037     // ntriples parameter is used to resize the graph. In turn, the 
00038     // class property ntriples is set to 0 by considering it as an 
00039     // incremental counter of the processed triples.
00040     
00041     this->dictionary = dictionary;
00042     this->parsing = parsing;
00043     this->ntriples = 0;
00044     
00045     graph.resize(ntriples);
00046 }
00047 
00048 PlainTriples::PlainTriples(Dictionary *dictionary, unsigned int ntriples, unsigned int parsing, string path)
00049 {
00050     // The class property ntriples is initialished with the ntriples
00051     // parameter because this constructor is used in LOAD processes.
00052     this->dictionary = dictionary;
00053     this->ntriples = ntriples;
00054     this->parsing = parsing;
00055     this->path = path;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void
00059 PlainTriples::console()
00060 {
00061     vector<string> subcommand;
00062     string command;
00063     char commandChar[256] ;
00064     
00065     string format="ntriples";
00066     string output="output.rdf";
00067     int i=0;
00068     
00069     
00070     cout.precision(4);
00071     cout << endl << "**************************" << endl;
00072     cout << "  Plain Triples Console" << endl;
00073     cout << "  ---------------------" << endl;
00074     
00075     while (true){
00076         format="ntriples";
00077         output="salida.rdf";
00078         
00079         cout <<"  Available Operations: " << endl;
00080         cout <<"        serialize                      Serialize HDT to RDF (ntriples by default). " << endl;
00081         cout <<"            -f format                         Output format: ntriples (default), rdfxml, turtle, rdfxml-abbrev, rdfxml-xmp, atom, json-triples, json, dot"<< endl;  
00082         cout <<"            -o --output <file>                Serialize output (output.rdf by default)"<< endl; 
00083         cout <<"        help                           Show this help"<< endl;  
00084         cout <<"        exit                           Exit console mode"<< endl;   
00085     
00086         cout << "**************************" << endl;
00087         cout << endl;
00088         cout<<"\n\n$>";
00089 
00090         cin.getline(commandChar,256);
00091         command = commandChar;
00092         
00093         if (command=="")
00094             cout<<"\n Please provide one available command.\n\n";
00095         else
00096         {
00097             //split as space separator
00098             stringExplode(command, " ", &subcommand);
00099             
00100             if (subcommand[0]=="serialize"){ 
00101                 
00102                 for (i=1;i<subcommand.size();){
00103                     //verify arguments              
00104                     if (subcommand[i]=="-f"){
00105                         
00106                         i=i+1;
00107                         if (i<(subcommand.size())){
00108                             if (subcommand[i][0]!='-') //other option
00109                             {
00110                                 format = subcommand[i];
00111                                 if (format!="ntriples" && format!="turtle" && format!="rdfxml-xmp" && format!="rdfxml-abbrev"
00112                                     && format!="rdfxml" && format!="rss-1.0" && format!="atom" && format!="dot"
00113                                     && format!="rss-1.0" && format!="json-triples" && format!="json"){
00114                                     cout<<   "<WARNING> The format:"<<format<<" is possibly not allowed by the serializer.\n\n";
00115                                 } 
00116                                 i=i+1;
00117                             }   
00118                         }
00119                     }
00120                     else if(subcommand[i]=="-o"){
00121                         i=i+1;
00122                         if (i<(subcommand.size())){
00123                             if (subcommand[i][0]!='-') //other option
00124                             {
00125                                 output = subcommand[i];
00126                                 i=i+1;
00127                             }
00128                         }
00129                     }
00130                     else
00131                         i=i+1;
00132                         
00133                 }
00134                 DataTime t1, t2;        
00135                 getTime(&t1);
00136                 bool ok = serialize((char*)output.c_str(),(char*)format.c_str());
00137                 getTime(&t2);
00138                 if (ok)
00139                 {
00140                     cout << "   <OK> The file '" << output << " has been successfully created in ";
00141                     cout << t2.user - t1.user << " seconds." << endl <<  endl;
00142                 }
00143             }else if (subcommand[0]=="exit"){ 
00144                 exit(0);
00145                 }
00146             else if (subcommand[0]=="help"){
00147                 //nothing to do
00148             }
00149             else {
00150                 cout<<"\n"<<subcommand[0]<<": command not found.\n\n";
00151             }
00152         }
00153         subcommand.clear();
00154     }
00155 }
00156 
00157 bool
00158 PlainTriples::loadGraphMemory(){
00159     
00160     unsigned int x, y, z;
00161     
00162     size_t read_x = 0, read_y = 0, read_z = 0;
00163     
00164     string input = path;
00165     FILE *triples = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples")).c_str(), "r");
00166     
00167     if (triples==NULL){
00168         cout << "Exception while reading Triples in "<<input<<".\n";
00169         exit(1);
00170     }
00171     
00172     graph.resize(ntriples);
00173     
00174     for (unsigned int i=0; i<ntriples; i++)
00175     {
00176         read_x += fread(&x,INT32,1,triples);
00177         read_y += fread(&y,INT32,1,triples);
00178         read_z += fread(&z,INT32,1,triples);
00179         
00180         graph[i].x = x;
00181         graph[i].y = y;
00182         graph[i].z = z;
00183     }
00184     
00185     fclose(triples);    
00186     
00187     if (read_z == ntriples)
00188     {
00189         return true;
00190     }
00191     else
00192     {
00193         cout << endl << "   <ERROR> The number of read triples does not match up with the expected one" << endl;
00194         return false;
00195     }
00196 }
00197 
00198 bool
00199 PlainTriples::transformToN3()
00200 {
00201     unsigned int x, y, z;
00202     size_t read_x = 0, read_y = 0, read_z = 0;
00203     string subject, predicate, object;
00204     TripleID triple;
00205     
00206     string input = path;
00207     FILE *triples = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples")).c_str(), "r");
00208     
00209     string output = path;
00210     output.append(".fromHDT.n3");
00211     ofstream outFile(output.c_str()); 
00212     
00213     for (unsigned int i=0; i<ntriples; i++)
00214     {
00215         read_x += fread(&x,INT32,1,triples);
00216         read_y += fread(&y,INT32,1,triples);
00217         read_z += fread(&z,INT32,1,triples);
00218         
00219         triple = retrieveTriple(x,y,z);
00220         
00221         subject = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00222         predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00223         object = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00224         
00225         outFile << subject << " " << predicate << " " << object << " ." << endl;
00226     }
00227 
00228     fclose(triples);    
00229     if (outFile.good()) outFile.close();
00230         
00231     if (read_z == ntriples)
00232     {
00233         return true;
00234     }
00235     else
00236     {
00237         cout << endl << "   <ERROR> The number of transformed triples does not match up with the expected one" << endl;
00238         return false;
00239     }
00240 }

00242 
00243 bool
00244 PlainTriples::serialize(char *output, char *format){
00245     
00246     unsigned int x, y, z;
00247     RDFSyntaxMediator rdfmediator;
00248     ofstream outFile;
00249     
00250     bool n3=true;
00251     if (strcmp(format,"ntriples")!=0){
00252         n3=false;
00253         rdfmediator.init_serialize(output,format);
00254     }
00255     else
00256     {
00257         outFile.open(output); 
00258     }
00259     
00260     
00261     size_t read_x = 0, read_y = 0, read_z = 0;
00262     string subject, predicate, object;
00263     TripleID triple;
00264     
00265     string input = path;
00266     FILE *triples = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples")).c_str(), "r");
00267     
00268     if (triples==NULL){
00269         cout << "Exception while reading Triples in "<<input<<".\n";
00270         exit(1);
00271     }
00272     
00273     for (unsigned int i=0; i<ntriples; i++)
00274     {
00275         read_x += fread(&x,INT32,1,triples);
00276         read_y += fread(&y,INT32,1,triples);
00277         read_z += fread(&z,INT32,1,triples);
00278         
00279         triple = retrieveTriple(x,y,z);
00280         
00281         subject = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00282         predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00283         object = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00284         
00285         //outFile 
00286         if (n3==true){
00287             outFile << subject << " " << predicate << " " << object << " ." << endl;
00288         }
00289         else{
00290             rdfmediator.serialize_statement(subject,predicate,object);
00291         }
00292     }
00293 
00294     fclose(triples);    
00295     if (n3==true){
00296         if (outFile.good()) outFile.close();
00297     }
00298     else
00299         rdfmediator.end_serialize();
00300         
00301     if (read_z == ntriples)
00302     {
00303         return true;
00304     }
00305     else
00306     {
00307         cout << endl << "   <ERROR> The number of transformed triples does not match up with the expected one" << endl;
00308         return false;
00309     }
00310 }

00312 unsigned int 
00313 PlainTriples::write(vector<TripleID> &graph, string path) {
00314     string output = path;
00315     FILE *triples = fopen((output.append(".hdt.triples")).c_str(), "w+");
00316     
00317     unsigned int repeated = 0;
00318     unsigned int x = graph[0].x, y = 0, z = 0;
00319     
00320     /*output = path;
00321      output.append(".pepe");
00322      ofstream outFile(output.c_str()); 
00323      
00324      string subject, predicate, object;*/
00325     
00326     for (unsigned int i=0; i<graph.size(); i++)
00327     {
00328         if (!((x == graph[i].x) && (y == graph[i].y) && (z == graph[i].z)))
00329         {
00330             x = graph[i].x; y = graph[i].y; z = graph[i].z;
00331             
00332             fwrite(&x,INT32,1,triples);
00333             fwrite(&y,INT32,1,triples);
00334             fwrite(&z,INT32,1,triples);     
00335             
00336             /*subject = dictionary->retrieveString(y, VOC_SUBJECT);
00337              predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(x, VOC_PREDICATE);
00338              object = dictionary->retrieveString(z, VOC_OBJECT);
00339              
00340              outFile<< subject << " " << predicate << " " << object << " ." << endl;*/
00341         }
00342         else
00343         {
00344             repeated++;
00345         }
00346     }
00347     
00348     /*outFile.close();*/
00349     fclose(triples);
00350     
00351     return graph.size()-repeated;
00352 }
00353 
00354     
00355 unsigned int 
00356 PlainTriples::write(string path)
00357 {   
00358     return PlainTriples::write(this->graph, path);
00359 }
